vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἐρῑθ-εία, ἡ,
labour for wages, [Refs 5th c.AD+]
__II canvassing for public office, intriguing, [Refs 4th c.BC+]
__II.2 selfish or factious ambition, ζῆλος καὶ ἐ. [NT]; plural, intrigues, party squabbles, [NT]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
selfish ambition, faction, strife
the service of a party, party spirit; feud, faction, 2Cor. 12:20; contentious disposition, selfish ambition, Gal. 5:20; Phil. 1:17; 2:3; Jas. 3:14; by implication untowardness, disobedience, Rom. 2:8; Jas. 3:16*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 原有為了官職不擇手段的意思
2) 紛爭, 自私, 野心
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 原有为了官职不择手段的意思
2) 纷争, 自私, 野心
